channel.description: Recent content in PBR on CYFan Blog

item.title: My Pbrt Engine
item.description: My own pbrt engine As a hibbist of raytracing, I would like to start my own Physically based Rendering Here are the few resources I am going to start with: pbrt book 3th edition Mitsuba Further Reading Raytracing System Kirk, D., and J.Arvo. 1988. The ray tracing kernel. In Proceedings of Ausgraph ‘88, 75-82
